projects.name: Project Manager App
projects.desc: As part of a backend development team of five, I implemented server-side functionality using PHP and MySQL, applied Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles, and developed unit tests to ensure the reliability of the Project Manager App, a tool to manage clients, projects, and tasks efficiently

projects.name: Email Client App
projects.desc: I worked as part of a team to develop an app that allows clients to manage their inbox, including reading, composing, and deleting emails. Role: Frontend Developer - Built the user interface with ReactJS and TailwindCSS, and integrated API functionality for email management

projects.name: Focus Frame
projects.desc: I collaborated with a team to create a responsive website for a photography school, designed to showcase its services and offerings. As a Frontend Developer, I built the Header section and implemented the modal menu using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

projects.name: Aqua Track
projects.desc: Working as part of a team of eight, I contributed to developing of a web application for water tracking and management. In my role as a backend developer, I implemented user authentication features, including signup, signin, and logout, using Node.js, MongoDB, and Swagger for API documentation, while applying Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles

projects.name: Portfolio for a Software Developer
projects.desc: I worked with a team to develop a responsive website  highlighting a developer's work experience and skills, incorporating transform effects and a modal menu. As Frontend Developer, I built the Covers and Benefits sections using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

projects.name: WebStudio
projects.desc: My first project: a WebStudio landing page built with HTML and CSS, featuring responsive design and optimised, retina-ready (high-DPI) images for high-resolution displays
